caption.p: Geological assessment units in the European Arctic with the highest gas (in trillion cubic feed of gas, TCFG) and oil (in billion barrel) potential. Horizontal lines (red for gas and brown for oil) show mean estimated volumes, vertical bars (in black) show the minimal volumes that are associated with the assessment units with a 5% (upper bound) and 95% (lower bound) chance. Source: Own presentation based on USGS ( 2008b)
